locations: Santa Monica, California, USA::(studio) (Circuit Works Fitness Studio)
imdb.plot outline: This is Circuit Works is the story of a small fitness studio's ambitious rise to become the next global franchise in one of the most competitive industries on the planet. This 8-episode documentary series immerses you head-first into the fanatic and sometimes cut-throat culture of fitness in Los Angeles, where one's desire for health and happiness are easily led astray by promises of fame and fortune. Following the daily lives of the gym's founder and his staff, we discover first-hand what it takes to find your own way and follow your dreams despite every obstacle in your way.
imdb.title: This Is Circuit Works
plot: This is Circuit Works is the story of a small fitness studio's ambitious rise to become the next global franchise in one of the most competitive industries on the planet. This 8-episode documentary series immerses you head-first into the fanatic and sometimes cut-throat culture of fitness in Los Angeles, where one's desire for health and happiness are easily led astray by promises of fame and fortune. Following the daily lives of the gym's founder and his staff, we discover first-hand what it takes to find your own way and follow your dreams despite every obstacle in your way.::Rachel Greenwood
